message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $80 to both of us and I believe it could greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $95 for this exceptional item. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $95 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. I'm willing to pay $80 for it, which is what it's worth to me.  Let me know if you're interested.
